section.section: Any State employee may be assigned to the office staff of the Governor-elect.

During that assignment, the employee:
is responsible only to the Governor-elect for the performance of duties;
is entitled to the compensation provided by law for the regular employment of the employee; and
retains the rights and privileges of that employment.
In addition to any State employee assigned under subsection (a) of this section, a Governor-elect may appoint other office staff.
An individual who is appointed under this subsection is not a regular employee of the State government.
